ljm

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ljm.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for generating a List of LjmJars from a given input string. This string should almost always come directly from a file. This parser is rather simple - there's no debugging features, etc. The syntax the parser uses is detailed in this project's readme.
    Since:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson

    • Method Detail

      • jarFrom

        private LjmJar jarFrom(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String file,
                       java.lang.String address)
        Create a LjmJar from some provided strings.
        Parameters:
        name - the jar's name.
        file - the jar's file.
        address - the jar's address.
        Returns:
        new LjmJar.

      • cycleMode

        private Parser.ParserMode cycleMode(Parser.ParserMode current)
        Based on an inputted mode, return the "next" mode.
        Parameters:
        current - the mode the parser is currently operating in.
        Returns:
        the next mode the parser should operate in.

      • parse

        public void parse()
        Parse the contents of this Parser.

        This method will first clear the jars list before populating that list with LjmJar instances it has generated from the provided contents.

      • getJars

        public java.util.List<LjmJar> getJars()
        Get the List of LjmJars the parser has parsed. If the parse() method has not been called, or if there was an exception while parsing the provided contents, this method will return an empty list.
        Returns:
        the list of LjmJar instances which the parser has generated from the provided contents.
